description:
Kushana lost one of her arms as a child during an Ohmu attack, and is driven by a desire for revenge against the http://anidb.net/t3798 [giant insects]. She intends to wipe the Sea of Corruption off the face of the earth, by any means necessary. While she is not presented as completely evil, she is definitely an antagonist.
Source: MyAnimeList
name: Kushana
